item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: Students looking to make a course change MUST sign up for a meeting in the Guidance office. Last day for course changes is Monday, February 9th.

item.title: A message from Mme Plourde:
item.description: There will be a meeting today during the am break for all Web crew and 7/8 student council. The meeting will take place in Mme Plourdes classroom.

item.title: A message from Mme Bourdon:
item.description: The ski/snowboard outing that was scheduled for Thursday Feb 12 will now take place on Wed Feb 11th. This weeks outing remains on Thursday.

item.title: A message from Mr. Vonesch:
item.description: Applications for next year's service trip to Costa Rica are due today. Please submit to Mr. Vonesch before the end of the day

item.title: A message from Mr. Vonesch:
item.description: STA's annual "Shrove Tuesday Pancake Breakfast" is coming up in 2 weeks! If you need volunteer hours, or would just like to help make and serve pancakes, please see Mr. Vonesch at the chaplaincy office to sign up!

item.title: A message from Mr. Lafleur:
item.description:
Tomorrow evening, STA will host RHS for our final two league games for Boys Basketball. The Juniors play at 6:30 and the Seniors, 8:00. Come out and support our Ravens Boys Basketball Teams!

Monday February 2nd

item.title: A message from Mr Vonesch:
item.description: A reminder to any interested grade 10/11 students, applications for next year's service trip to Costa Rica are due tomorrow. Please see Mr. Vonesch at the chaplaincy office for details.

item.title: A message from Mrs Marcellus:
item.description: Grad photo orders have started to arrive. If you ordered grad photos, please check in Guidance with Mrs Marcellus to pick them up. Thanks!

item.title: A message from Ms.Timmins:
item.description: Reminder to Varsity Girls' hockey players to check Teams for important information regarding hockey this week.

item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: All online students need to report to the atrium at the beginning of their online period today to meet briefly with Ms. Timmins and Mrs. Marcellus.

item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: Students looking to make a course change MUST sign up for a meeting in the Guidance office.

item.title: A message from: Mrs. Longval :
item.description: Attention Ravens! Interested in joining the Varsity CrossFit Team? Sign-up sheets are posted outside the gymnasium. There will be an info meeting on Tuesday, February 10 at 10:45 a.m. in the weight room. Training sessions run Tuesdays from 2:20–3:00 p.m. and our CrossFit competition is scheduled for April 2026. Come check it out!

item.title: A message from Mrs. Longval:
item.description: the Weight Room is open daily at lunch from 10:40–11:20. Thursdays are reserved for female students only. Plus, the weight room is also open Tuesday after school. Come Join Mrs. Longval for a strength, cardio or stretch session.

item.title: A message from: M. Décoste:
item.description: There will be a meeting for 7/8 boys volleyball today at 11:20 in room 148.
